text:
Name: Darien National Park. short_description:

Forming a bridge between the two continents of the New World, Darien National Park contains an exceptional variety of habitats â€“ sandy beaches, rocky coasts, mangroves, swamps, and lowland and upland tropical forests containing remarkable wildlife. Two Indian tribes live in the park.
